lead_paragraph: Football fans see the NFL's annual scouting combine as merely a numbers game that comes down to the times, jumps and drills they witness on television.

headline.print_headline: NFL Teams Use Scouting Combine for More Than Numbers Game
headline.main: NFL Teams Use Scouting Combine for More Than Numbers Game
